title: Mazzo
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. High-end Italian restaurant with labeled vegetarian choices including pizzas, pasta dishes, risotto, antipasti, salads and panini, and breakfast. Vegan items include one pasta dish, soup, salads and bruschetta. Some of the vegetarian dishes can be made vegan upon request by omitting pesto or cheese.
